name: Witches Ladder Necklace
description:
This is my first offering in my new line -BURNT OFFERINGS- neck and arm pieces as well as rings featuring charred wood, goat leather, silk, human hair,cotton and wool fibers. The charred wood "jewels" are remnants of ceremonial fires and are only created 8 times a year during the traditional Pagan Sabbats. 

This neck piece features preserved charred wood hung from a leather and cotton 13 knot witch's ladder. I small charred wood clasp allows you to wrap and wear this piece many different ways The overall length of this piece is 36"

name: The 7 Signs Necklace
description: This 2 sided good luck coin charm is cast in Ancient Bronze as an alchemical nod to its mystic past and is oxidized and carefully hand polished to a fiery antique finish. This pendant measures 1.25 inches long and is hung from a 24 inch hand oxidized sterling silver chain.

name: The Fortuna Necklace
description:
The Fortuna Necklace is a modern interpretation of the traditional Etruscan Mano Fico amulet. A popular design to this day, it is believed to invoke the protection of the Goddess as well as protect the health and fertility of whomever wears it.

My reinterpretation of the design is cast in fiery ancient bronze as an alchemical nod the The Goddess. It is then submerged into steaming brimstone (really) then polished to a sludgy grey finish and hung from a matching 24 inch oxidized sterling silver chain.

The pendant measures 1.5 inches long and weighs a substantial 1.4 oz.

name: The Tritone Ring
description:
This sterling silver band is wrapped with a trio of guitar strings which are then flanked by a raised sterling silver border. It is then oxidized and the ring is polished to a sludgy black finish. This ring is truly born of fire and brimstone!

The Tritone ring is a tribute to the devils interval. Since medieval times the tritone, nicknamed "diabolus in musica", was regarded as an unstable interval and rejected in popular music. In classical music it was used to suggest evil and, more recently, it is what put the Black in Sabbath.

Pre-used guitar strings are used in this design so please allow for slight surface flaws and variations.

This ring is made to order. Allow 2 weeks for it to be created. Please be sure to send me your correct ring size at time of purchase.
